sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或词组均含有"召集，召唤"之意。
means: call ： 非正式用词，含义广泛，指用说话或呼叫的形式召唤。
summon ： 正式用词，指官方或正式的召集，召集者具有权力或权威性。
send for ： 作"召唤"解时，语气较随便，暗示委派一件工作。

sentence.Network_en: We couldn't even summon up the energy to open the envelope.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们甚至连打开信封的力气都没有了。

sentence.Network_en: The oddest events will summon up memories.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些非常稀奇古怪的事情会唤起人们的记忆。

sentence.Network_en: It took her a full month to summon the courage to tell her mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用了整整一个月才鼓足勇气告诉了妈妈。

call to mind 回忆，回想summon up唤起reconcile v. 使和好，调解，使调和；使一致(to).

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French somondre, from Latin summonere 'give a hint', later 'call, summon', from sub- 'secretly' + monere 'warn'

entry.def: If you summon someone, you order them to come to you.

example.ex: Howe summoned a doctor and hurried over...
example.tran: 豪叫了医生，然后匆忙赶了过来。

example.ex: Suddenly we were summoned to the interview room...
example.tran: 突然我们被叫进了面试的房间。

entry.tran: 鼓起(勇气);振作;使出(力气)
entry.def: If you summon a quality, you make a great effort to have it. For example, if you summon the courage or strength to do something, you make a great effort to be brave or strong, so that you will be able to do it.

example.ex: It took her a full month to summon the courage to tell her mother.
example.tran: 她用了整整一个月才鼓足勇气告诉了妈妈。

means.word_mean: 1. call in an official matter, such as to attend court
4. make ready for action or use;

auth_sentence.content: Hollande should summon them soon, and hide the bill.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hollande should summon them soon, and hide the bill.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hollande should summon them soon, and hide the bill.

auth_sentence.content: She whistled on a small silver call...used to summon domestics.
auth_sentence.res_content: She whistled on a small silver call...used to summon domestics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She whistled on a small silver call...used to summon domestics.

auth_sentence.content: Just don't expect anyone to summon an easy answer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just don't expect anyone to summon an easy answer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just don't expect anyone to summon an easy answer.

Sentence.sentence: Bosses have been summoned to Washington to be scolded on live television.

sentences.en: The general summoned all his officers.
sentences.cn: 将军把所有的军官召集在一起。

sentences.en: They summoned men to defend their country.
sentences.cn: 他们召集男人来保卫国家。

sentences.en: He was summoned as a witness by the court.
summon the nerve to do sth.

jushi.english: They advised me to summon a physician.
I summoned all my courage for the task.
jushi.chinese: 我鼓起了最大的勇气去完成那项任务。
